other.start: ğŸ‘‹ Hello! I am a bot, which can hide your message from prying eyes! To hide the message write @{username} and your message in any chat. At the end, you can specify the users who will see the message. For example: @{username} it's top secret message! @unneyon, then only @unneyon will see the message.
